attributes.action: UK Government to acknowledge and address the issues of the border crossing between Gibraltar and Spain now
attributes.additional_details: Sign if you want the UK Government to actually acknowledge and address the issues of the border crossing between Gibraltar and Spain and to provide actual answers and solutions for the people who's lives are being effected by the situation, instead of their usual line of 'We're looking into it' which is politician speak for 'We're waiting for you to forget about the issue'
